TextView.android:text:
A HD 3D Gallery Live Wallpaper APP within a 3D Cube.

 You can change images with your own photos of loved ones.
 You can even increase/decrease the speed of rotating cube.

 You can set the position of the cube anywhere in the screen.

 You can even change direction of cube rotation angle.(vertical, horizontal as well as random)


It's performance is heavily optimized as it is created using textures in OpenGLES with good memory handling. Won't slow your phone down at all.
